summary: This document is an email communication from Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, discussing a meeting request from Jeffrey Epstein to set up a meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team managing his accounts. The email emphasizes the need to confirm availability for the meeting during the week of October 8 when Epstein returns to New York City.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is reaching out to coordinate a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team regarding his accounts.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as a member of the Deutsche Bank team who will be involved in managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as the person who informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is a client of Amanda Kirby, who is coordinating a meeting for him.
Jeffrey Epstein is seeking to meet with Paul, who is part of the team managing his accounts.
Amanda Kirby is in communication with Harry regarding Epstein's meeting request.

events.title: Meeting Coordination
events.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team during the week of October 8.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team managing his accounts.
The meeting is to be scheduled for the week of October 8 when Epstein returns to NYC.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for the meeting.
